body:
Mostapha and Chris, thank you for your fast reply.



I have tried to contact the DesignBuilder team for this, but the problem is that the import of gbXML is not working perfectly I am afraid. My main goal was to make the natural ventilation simulation through DB. I am trying to find another way to simulate natural ventilation, and regarding this I have posted another discussion.

If you want you can have a look here: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/interzone-a...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/interzone-airflow-rate-for-a-large-volume?xg_source=activity)

I hope someone can help me.



Thank you very much again.

Antonio
